data.name: Robotherapy
data.detailed_description:
You're a robot therapist in a dystopian robot society that killed all humans, but is still not happy. Talk to your robot patients, make dialogue choices, meet damaged robots and learn about robot nature. If killing all humans doesn't bring happiness, then what does?

YOU ARE A ROBOT THERAPIST

TALK TO ROBOT PATIENTS

MEET BROKEN ROBOTS

FEATURES

  • Make dialogue choices as you experience a story of pain, hope and healing.
  • 5 robot characters for you to hate, love and everything inbetween.
  • 3 chapters in a story about psychological healing and the human mind. I mean, the robot mind.
  • Choose what kind of robotherapist you're going to be as you progress.
  • At least FIVE jokes.
  • Enter the minds of your patients in a minigame. How cool is that?
  • Featuring art, music and story by Lucas Molina.
  • Different outcomes/endings for characters depending on your choices.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Chipset 3000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Chipset 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS

  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
